name: Phylogeography
body:
### Welcome to the phylogeography organization
This page contain supplementary material for various manuscripts:

1. Cybis _et al._, Bayesian nonparametric clustering in phylogenetics: modeling antigenic evolution in influenza. _Statistics in Medicine_.

  * [Antigenic comparison video](videos/pCRP-comparison.pdf)
  * [H1N1 BEAST XML](xml/H1N1.xml)
  * [H1N1 tree sample](xml/H1N1_sample.trees)
  * [H1N1 HI data](xml/H1N1_HI_data.txt)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
